generated_doNotEdit.title: Surface Particle Color Query
generated_doNotEdit.description: Returns the particle color for the block located in the surface below the actor (scanned up to 10 blocks down). The struct contains '.r' '.g' '.b' and '.a' members, each 0.0 to 1.0. If no actor is specified or if no surface is found, each member value is set to 0.0. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
